message: BTW. I'm going to keep streaming, because I genuinely like it. Expect them all to be super late though because that's legit the ONLY time I am able to stream. I am only streaming League of Legends because that's all I care to play these days. Hope you enjoyed my dose of reality
reason: The message does not contain any offensive, rude, or disrespectful language. It is a neutral statement about the user's streaming schedule and game preference.
